alert.note: Alert for Northwest Howard; Northwest Montgomery; Southern Baltimore (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 2:33PM EST until January 03 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 1 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...In Maryland, Southern Baltimore, Northwest Howard and Northwest Montgomery Counties. In Virginia, Eastern Loudoun and Western Loudoun Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 1 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Howard; Northwest Montgomery; Southern Baltimore
